title: CCJK Type Blog
content:
For those interested in all things CCJK (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, and Korean), the folks in our Beijing office started a CCJK Type Blog. See: [http://blogs.adobe.com/CCJKType/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081028162639/http:/blogs.adobe.com/CCJKType/ "http://blogs.adobe.com/CCJKType/")

author: lunde
